Articles.Content: Well now I\'ve realized something. My graphics card has more memory then what my computer is currently giving it.(Which is two-hundred something MBs.) It can go up yo 806 MBs how do I switch it higher then this? I can just barely run space engine on it\'s lowest settings. It\'s also the same with KSP. Oh yeah, graphics card is a ATI radeon 3100.

Not sure how to do that, but is it necessary?

Memory on GPU\'s is mainly used for storing textures and the like that will be used in the current scene.

I actually thought it was auto-regulated by the game, not so much windows.

That would mean KSP is using the amount it needs, and your GPU has room to spare
